title: NewsNews
content:
Nathan Gill admits eight charges of bribery while being a Member of the European Parliament.

Labour is facing a fight to retain the seat in a Senedd by-election next month.

Year 10 pupils starting in September 2025 are the first to study new-look GCSEs, but what are they?

The former TV reporter who also worked in housing says Wales needs "positive political change".

But she was put on the back foot in First Minister's Questions when asked for specific NHS figures.

Labour is facing a fight to retain the seat in a Senedd by-election next month.

The number of Members of the Senedd will rise from 60 to 96 after the next election.

Year 10 students in Wales are the first to begin the new courses after a major curriculum overhaul.

Year 10 pupils starting in September 2025 are the first to study new-look GCSEs, but what are they?

Eluned Morgan is quizzed by opposition party leaders and other MSs during First Minister's Questions.

After polls suggesting Labour could finish third in May's election, is era-defining change looming?

A Welsh Labour grandee fears the party is facing "the biggest kicking in our history".

The health secretary says it is time to seek a different challenge and spend time with loved ones.

A recent opinion poll showed the Welsh Conservatives had dropped to fourth place.
